text: Family Weekend is an American comedy/drama movie. It was the first movie directed by Benjamin Epps. It stars Matthew Modine, Kristin Chenoweth, Olesya Rulin, Joey King, Shirley Jones, and Chloe Bridges. It was released on March 29, 2013. Category:2013 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:English-language movies Category:American independent movies
title: Family Weekend
